messages.message: would be good to get product's insight here as I'm facing this with a few customer conversations where we are selling to a parent company with many subsidiaries operating across georgraphies e.g. Kering, Lufthansa (300 subsidiaries), Bertelsmann. In these cases the centralised team aren't the only ones building - their goal is to provide licenses to the business units to build their own solutions. What's the recommended approach for how to operationalise this citizen development type programme in an easy to manage way?

I understand the desire for hierarchy, but I'm also thinking strong naming conventions + workspace search ability can get pretty far. I also wonder if implementing some rudimentary `tags` could be a middle ground between full hierarchy and what we have today where every workspace is equal. But def requires more thought.
